review: I was motivated to try this after the rave reviews and we are VERY HAPPY we did! We have had an Apple TV for 3 years and have been using that for streaming, but when I finally decided to add Amazon Prime, I didn't have a way to stream to our TV. So I decided to give it a whirl after reviewing specs & reviews. It is WAY better then Apple TV, much much faster and has a smooth interface that goes head to head with Apple. The voice recognition totally does work, no joke! We love it. The only thing that is a bummer, is that we cannot stream our HBO Go (yet)  as our current cable provider (Comcast Xfinity) it not listed..I take this as it means it will eventually get on here, but not yet. So for now, I have to go back to Apple TV if I want to stream HBO Go. For the price, I paid only $79, I totally recommend this. I cannot say how much I love it. Plus the prices that Amazon charges for the pay (on demand) movies are cheaper than iTunes.
